title: Large 1 Bedroom Unit Ready Today!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 748 Sq.
From the inside out – right in the center of Silicon Valley.
Vibrant decor and Spanish-influenced design lend a traditional vibe, while tech-savvy details and beautiful landscaping keeps things modern and always relaxed.
Work, connect, play and get inspired at Fountain Plaza.
**Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765**Please consult the community leasing office to determine applicable licensed company.

Oversized Closets*, Wired for Ceiling Fans in Bedrooms and Living Room*, Garden-Style Soaking Tubs*, Loft-Style Floor Plans*, Personal Balconies*, Kitchen Islands*, Spiral Staircases*, Wired for Alarm System, Maple, Raised-Panel Kitchen Cabinets, Elevator*, Built-In Desks*, Full-Size Washers and Dryers

Additional Storage Available, See Sales Associate for Details., Easy Access to Highways 87, 280, 101 and 880, Gated Community, Garage or Covered Parking*, Conference Room, Resort-Style Pool, We Love Pets!*, Resident Clubhouse, Close to Shopping and Fine Dining, Near Public Transportation, Business Center, Relaxing Spa, Close to Hiking and Biking Trails, Minutes from Downtown San Jose, 24/7 Complete Fitness Center, Furnished Units Available*
